title: How to transfer Grammarly Pro plan ownership
content:
Included in:
Grammarly Pro plans
Available to:
Account owners
You can transfer account ownership to another member by following these steps:
Go to the
Subscription
page.
Under the
Details
section, click
Change owner
.
In the window that appears next, select another member and click
Continue
.
After confirming this action, you will be offered to update your payment method on file. You can skip this step if youâ€™d like the payment method to remain unchanged.
Note:
If you purchased your Grammarly Pro plan through our Sales team, please reach out to your Customer Success Manager instead or
contact Support
.
If needed, you can afterward leave your current Grammarly Pro team from your
Profile
page.
